meanings.sent2: He always works competently on his assignments.
meanings.sent3: The robot competently followed the instructions to make breakfast.
meanings.sent4: The student navigated the maze of equations competently.
meanings.sent5: The firefighter competently rescued the cat from the tree.

meanings.definition: In a capable or efficient manner.
meanings.sent1: The chef competently prepared the delicious meal.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic competently fixed the car engine.
meanings.sent3: The magician competently pulled a rabbit out of the hat.
meanings.sent4: The athlete competently crossed the finish line first.
meanings.sent5: The nurse competently administered the medication to the patient.
